FUSE6.NAME: EESAVE
FUSE6.TEXT: Keep EEprom contents during chip erase

FUSE4.NAME: CKDIV8
FUSE4.TEXT: Start up with system clock divided by 8

TEXT2.TEXT: Preserve EEPROM memory through the Chip Erase cycle; [EESAVE=0]

TEXT5.TEXT: Ext. Clock; Start-up time: 14 CK + 0 ms; [CKSEL=00 SUT=00]

TEXT6.TEXT: Ext. Clock; Start-up time: 14 CK + 4 ms; [CKSEL=00 SUT=01]

TEXT7.TEXT: Ext. Clock; Start-up time: 14 CK + 64 ms; [CKSEL=00 SUT=10]

TEXT8.TEXT: Int. RC Osc. 4.8 MHz; Start-up time: 14 CK + 0 ms; [CKSEL=01 SUT=00]

TEXT9.TEXT: Int. RC Osc. 4.8 MHz; Start-up time: 14 CK + 4 ms; [CKSEL=01 SUT=01]

TEXT10.TEXT: Int. RC Osc. 4.8 MHz; Start-up time: 14 CK + 64 ms; [CKSEL=01 SUT=10]

TEXT11.TEXT: Int. RC Osc. 9.6 MHz; Start-up time: 14 CK + 0 ms; [CKSEL=10 SUT=00]

TEXT12.TEXT: Int. RC Osc. 9.6 MHz; Start-up time: 14 CK + 4 ms; [CKSEL=10 SUT=01]

TEXT13.TEXT: Int. RC Osc. 9.6 MHz; Start-up time: 14 CK + 64 ms; [CKSEL=10 SUT=10]; default value

TEXT14.TEXT: Int. RC Osc. 128 kHz; Start-up time: 14 CK + 0 ms; [CKSEL=11 SUT=00]

TEXT15.TEXT: Int. RC Osc. 128 kHz; Start-up time: 14 CK + 4 ms; [CKSEL=11 SUT=01]

TEXT16.TEXT: Int. RC Osc. 128 kHz; Start-up time: 14 CK + 64 ms; [CKSEL=11 SUT=10]

TEXT3.TEXT: Brown-out detection level at VCC=4.3 V; [BODLEVEL=00]

TEXT4.TEXT: Brown-out detection level at VCC=2.7 V; [BODLEVEL=01]

TEXT5.TEXT: Brown-out detection level at VCC=1.8 V; [BODLEVEL=10]

TEXT7.TEXT: Reset Disabled (Enable PB5 as i/o pin); [RSTDISBL=0]

LOCKBIT.TEXT: [LB1 = 1 : LB2 = 1] No memory lock features enabled. [LB1 = 0 : LB2 = 1] Further programming of Flash and EEPROM is enabled. [LB1 = 0 : LB2 = 0] Same as previous, but verify is also disabled

TEXT1.TEXT: Mode 1: No memory lock features enabled

TEXT3.TEXT: Mode 3: Further programming and verification disabled
